mapper.insert: INSERT INTO banner (banner_id, banner_name, image_url, link_url, seq, start_date, end_date, created_at, created_by) VALUES (#{bannerId}, #{bannerName}, #{imageUrl}, #{linkUrl}, #{seq}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT banner_id, banner_name, image_url, link_url, seq, start_date, end_date FROM banner WHERE end_date > CURDATE() ORDER BY seq
SELECT banner_id, banner_name, image_url, link_url, display_yn, seq, start_date, end_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM banner WHERE start_date = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(seq), 0) FROM banner WHERE end_date > CURDATE()
